1429460.name: Legendary Journeys Demo
1429460.description:
A group of friends, seeking adventure in their doldrum lives, get exactly what they crave,
when a man bursts through their local tavern door and collapses with a note and a strange utterance
on his dying breath.
Immerse yourself in a world of high fantasy and adventure as you lead this group from their small
village to distant shores of Umbrea and other lands in the world of Farmoor to find out what the
dying man's words meant.

  • Large world to explore
  • Non-linear adventure
  • Create your party from Human, Elf, Half-Elf, Dwarf, Half-Orc and the mysterious Khoth
  • Choose how your characters develop within their chosen class
  • Turn-based combat to give you time to plan
  • First-person party, free-roaming movement
1429460.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
